VIII.iv.1.B.1.d
.
MST Claim Processing Requirements
All development actions on claims involving MST must
only
be taken by an individual who
has completed the required MST training module(s)
has been designated as an MST claims processor, and
is assigned to a
specialized MST claims processing site, or
special mission station responsible for the claim due to other special circumstances.
Important
:  To ensure accurate claims processing, the following checklist and worksheet are required for completion and uploading to the claims folder:
Personal Trauma Development Checklist
, and
Personal Trauma Incident/Marker Worksheet
.
Exception
:  When processing an
active duty
Integrated Disability Evaluation System, Benefits Delivery at Discharge (BDD), or BDD-excluded claim based on personal trauma, to include MST, the above checklist and worksheet are not required.
Note
:  Communication with the designated VBA MST Outreach Coordinator may be warranted, if applicable as described in
M27-2, Part I, 2.08
.
Reference
:  For more information on the requirement that MST-related claims be worked by specialized claims processors, see
38 U.S.C. 1166
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 1, Section B - Development for Posttraumatic Stress Disorder (PTSD) or Other Claims Related to Personal Trauma
